Text: Ken On behalf of everyone in Wessex I wanted to express our shock horror outrage its really not possible to find words strong enough at yesterdays terrible events Our thoughts and deepest sympathy go to all our colleagues and indeed to everyone in the US Colin This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed If you have received this email in error please notify the Wessex Water IT Support Centre on or email This footnote also confirms that this email message has been swept by MIMEsweeper for the presence of computer viruses wwwmimesweepercom
